title: Googleâ€™s Archived APK format is a new way to free up storage on Android
content:
Many desktop applications and games allow you to keep local data after an uninstall, but that option is less common on Android. That’s especially a problem with phones and tablets, where storage is often more limited. Google is now working on a new solution baked into its development tools: Archived APKs. Google wrote on the

The post Google’s Archived APK format is a new way to free up storage on Android appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google announced a new feature for App Bundles, which can 'archive' apps and free up storage by removing parts that don't store data.
